nodes.title: Understand the importance of critical thinking
nodes.desc: Recognize the value of critical thinking in evaluating information, making informed decisions, and solving problems. [criticalthinking](https://www.criticalthinking.org/pages/critical-thinking/606)

nodes.title: Set learning goals for critical thinking
nodes.desc: Define clear objectives to develop critical thinking skills, such as analyzing arguments and identifying biases. [edglossary](https://www.edglossary.org/critical-thinking/)

nodes.title: Master basic concepts of creative thinking
nodes.desc: Grasp fundamental principles such as brainstorming, mind mapping, and SCAMPER. [creativity](https://www.creativitypost.com/)

nodes.title: Learn to brainstorm
nodes.desc: Develop skills in generating a large number of ideas in a short amount of time. [mindtools](https://www.mindtools.com/pages/main/newMN_TED.htm)

nodes.title: Learn to mind map
nodes.desc: Develop skills in visually organizing ideas and concepts. [mindtools](https://www.mindtools.com/pages/main/newMN_TED.htm)

nodes.title: Learn to use SCAMPER
nodes.desc: Develop skills in applying SCAMPER (Substitute, Combine, Adapt, Modify, Put to Another Use, Eliminate, and Rearrange) to generate new ideas. [mindtools](https://www.mindtools.com/pages/main/newMN_TED.htm)

nodes.title: Understand the importance of analytical thinking
nodes.desc: Recognize the value of analytical thinking in evaluating data, identifying patterns, and making informed decisions. [analyticalthinking](https://www.analyticalthinking.com/)

nodes.title: Set learning goals for analytical thinking
nodes.desc: Define clear objectives to develop analytical thinking skills, such as data analysis and statistical reasoning. [edglossary](https://www.edglossary.org/analytical-thinking/)

nodes.title: Choose suitable resources for analytical thinking
nodes.desc: Select books, articles, and online courses that focus on analytical thinking, such as "Data Analysis with Python" or "Statistical Reasoning for Everyday Life". [amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=analytical+thinking)

nodes.title: Master basic concepts of analytical thinking
nodes.desc: Grasp fundamental principles such as data analysis, statistical reasoning, and data visualization. [analyticalthinking](https://www.analyticalthinking.com/)

nodes.title: Learn to analyze data
nodes.desc: Develop skills in collecting, organizing, and analyzing data to inform decisions. [dataanalysis](https://www.dataanalysis.com/)

nodes.title: Learn to apply statistical reasoning
nodes.desc: Develop skills in applying statistical concepts to real-world problems. [statistics](https://www.statistics.com/)

nodes.title: Choose suitable resources for critical thinking
nodes.desc: Select books, articles, and online courses that focus on critical thinking, such as "The Art of Reasoning" or "Critical Thinking: A Very Short Introduction". [amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=critical+thinking)

nodes.title: Learn to visualize data
nodes.desc: Develop skills in presenting data in a clear and meaningful way. [datavisualization](https://www.datavisualization.com/)

nodes.title: Understand the importance of logical thinking
nodes.desc: Recognize the value of logical thinking in evaluating arguments, making informed decisions, and solving problems. [logicalthinking](https://www.logicalthinking.com/)

nodes.title: Set learning goals for logical thinking
nodes.desc: Define clear objectives to develop logical thinking skills, such as deductive reasoning and logical fallacies. [edglossary](https://www.edglossary.org/logical-thinking/)

nodes.title: Choose suitable resources for logical thinking
nodes.desc: Select books, articles, and online courses that focus on logical thinking, such as "The Art of Reasoning" or "Logical Thinking: A Practical Guide". [amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=logical+thinking)

nodes.title: Master basic concepts of logical thinking
nodes.desc: Grasp fundamental principles such as deductive reasoning, logical fallacies, and argumentation. [logicalthinking](https://www.logicalthinking.com/)

nodes.title: Learn to apply deductive reasoning
nodes.desc: Develop skills in using logical rules to arrive at a conclusion. [deductivereasoning](https://www.deductivereasoning.com/)

nodes.title: Learn to identify logical fallacies
nodes.desc: Develop skills in recognizing and avoiding common logical fallacies. [logicalfallacies](https://www.logicalfallacies.com/)

nodes.title: Master basic concepts of critical thinking
nodes.desc: Grasp fundamental principles such as logic, argumentation, and problem-solving. [criticalthinking](https://www.criticalthinking.org/pages/critical-thinking/606)

nodes.title: Learn to analyze arguments
nodes.desc: Develop skills in evaluating arguments, identifying biases, and recognizing fallacies. [criticalthinking](https://www.criticalthinking.org/pages/critical-thinking/606)

nodes.title: Learn to solve problems
nodes.desc: Apply critical thinking to solve complex problems, considering multiple perspectives and evaluating evidence. [problem-solving](https://www.mindtools.com/pages/main/newMN_TED.htm)

nodes.title: Learn to make informed decisions
nodes.desc: Use critical thinking to evaluate options, weigh pros and cons, and make informed decisions. [decision-making](https://www.mindtools.com/pages/main/newMN_TED.htm)

nodes.title: Understand the importance of creative thinking
nodes.desc: Recognize the value of creative thinking in generating innovative ideas and solving complex problems. [creativity](https://www.creativitypost.com/)

nodes.title: Set learning goals for creative thinking
nodes.desc: Define clear objectives to develop creative thinking skills, such as brainstorming and mind mapping. [edglossary](https://www.edglossary.org/creative-thinking/)

nodes.title: Choose suitable resources for creative thinking
nodes.desc: Select books, articles, and online courses that focus on creative thinking, such as "The War of Art" or "Creative Thinking: A Practical Guide". [amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=creative+thinking)
